title: White House claims Europe facing "civilizational erasure" in 2 decades
description: The Trump administration says societal threats mean some European nations may not be "strong enough to remain reliable allies."
content: The Trump administration claims in its new National Security Strategy, published early Friday morning, that some of America's oldest allies in Europe face "the real and more stark prospect of civiliz… [+2994 chars]
